name: Wiceard
description:
Song is here: https://soundcloud.com/giggs-sa/chill21

The game is pretty well broken, Godot crashes on changing scenes and there's no error messages anywhere, so I'll have to just re-do that component.

On top of that, there is very little feedback in-game. I'm not gonna be able to fix these things in the next 1.5 hours before the deadline, but maybe I'll come back to it in a couple days!
